sourcesContent:
<template>    
    <v-sheet>
        <v-toolbar elevation="1" dark style = "background:#0078be"  height="50%" >
            <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click.stop="drawer = !drawer" ></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
            <v-toolbar-title class="d-none d-sm-flex">
                <v-img
                    src="@/assets/logo.png"
                ></v-img>
            </v-toolbar-title>
            <v-spacer></v-spacer>
            <v-select
                style="maxWidth: 200px;padding:10px"
                v-model="setLocale"
                :label="$t('Idioma')"
                :items="languages"
                item-value="shortCode"
                item-text="text"
                @change="handleChange"
                hide-details
                id="langSelect"
                dense
                outlined
            ></v-select>
            <v-menu offset-y>
                <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
                    <v-btn icon v-bind="attrs" v-on="on" >
                        <v-icon>mdi-dots-vertical</v-icon>
                    </v-btn>
                </template>
                <v-list nav dense>
                    <v-list-item-group color="primary" >
                        <v-list-item >
                            <v-list-item-title>
                                <router-link to="/Settings">{{$t("Configuracion")}}</router-link>
                            </v-list-item-title>
                        </v-list-item>
                        <v-list-item >
                            <v-list-item-title  @click="Logout()">{{$t("Sesion")}}</v-list-item-title>
                        </v-list-item>
                    </v-list-item-group>
                </v-list>
            </v-menu>
        </v-toolbar>
 

        <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer"  absolute temporary dark >
            <v-list-item>      
                <v-list-item-avatar class="mx-auto">
                    <v-img src="https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/men/78.jpg"></v-img>
                </v-list-item-avatar>
            </v-list-item>  
            <v-list-item>                
                <v-list-item-content>
                    <v-list-item-title class="text-center font-weight-black">{{usuario.nombre}}</v-list-item-title>
                    <v-list-item-title class="text-center">{{usuario.mail}}</v-list-item-title>
                </v-list-item-content>
            </v-list-item>  
            <v-divider></v-divider>
            <v-list nav dense>            
                <v-list-group color="primary" v-for="item in items" :key="item.title" v-model="item.active" :prepend-icon="item.action" no-action>
                    <template v-slot:activator>
                        <v-list-item-content>
                            <v-list-item-title v-text="item.title"></v-list-item-title>
                        </v-list-item-content>
                    </template>
                    <v-list nav dense>
                        <v-list-item-group color="primary" >
                            <v-list-item v-for="child in item.items" :key="child.title">
                                <router-link :to="child.url">{{ child.title }}</router-link>
                            </v-list-item>
                        </v-list-item-group>
                    </v-list>

                </v-list-group>
            </v-list>
            <v-divider></v-divider>
            <v-footer absolute dark>
                <v-btn block class="primary" @click="Logout()">
                    {{$t("Sesion")}}
                </v-btn>
            </v-footer>
        </v-navigation-drawer>
    </v-sheet>
</template>

<script>
    import { mapState } from 'vuex'
    import router from '../router'

    export default {
        name: 'Sidebar',
        data () {
            const langu = localStorage.getItem('lang') || 'es';
            return {
                drawer: null,
                Username:"Rogelio",
                languages: [
                    { shortCode: 'en', text: 'English' },
                    { shortCode: 'es', text: 'Espa√±ol' },
                ],
                setLocale: langu,
                items: [
                    {
                        action: 'mdi-account',
                        items: [
                            { title: 'Mi perfil', url:'/Perfil' },
                            { title: 'Mi calendario', url:'/calendar' }
                        ],
                        title: 'Mi persona',
                    },
                    {
                        action: 'mdi-city',
                        items: [
                            { title: 'Registrar visita',url:'/registro_visitantes' },
                            { title: 'Evaluacion 360 para plantas',url:'/360_plantas' },
                        ],
                         title: 'Mi Empresa',
                    },
                    {
                        action: 'mdi-account-multiple',
                        items: [
                            { title: 'Administracion de puestos',url:'/administracion_puestos' },
                        ],
                         title: 'Mi Equipo',
                    },
                    {
                        action: 'mdi-view-dashboard',
                        items: [
                            { title: 'Evaluacion 360 para plabtas',url:'/360_plantas_adm' },
                            { title: 'Crear oferta economica',url:'/ofertas_economicas' },
                            { title: 'Ofertas economica pendientes',url:'/ofertas_economicas_adm' },
                        ],
                         title: 'Administracion',
                    }
                ]
            }
        },
        methods:{
            Logout(){
                localStorage.clear(); 
                window.location.reload()
            },
            handleChange(event){
                localStorage.setItem('lang',event)
                window.location.reload()
            }
        },
        computed:{
            ...mapState(['usuario'])
        }
    }
</script>
<style>
    .v-avatar{
        height: 75px !important;
        min-width: 75px !important;
        width: 75px !important;
    }
</style>
